structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Tobacco Products; Sale Or Shipment To Minors; Prevention
law.text: The department of public health may, in consultation with the attorney general and the department of revenue, establish regulations for persons engaged in the sale or shipment of tobacco products to prevent the sale or delivery of tobacco products to children under 18 years of age in the commonwealth.
